waffleoRai_Utils

Class BitStreamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • waffleoRai_Utils.BitStreamer

  • public class BitStreamer
extends java.lang.Object
    A sleaker way to stream bits from a byte buffer (FileBuffer object). Also includes static methods for individual bit reading and writing.
    Since:
    September 8, 2017
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Blythe Hospelhorn
